name: Breaking Mad
description:
The mad scientist made a series of unsuccessful experiments and now dangerous monsters are walking around the world, which must be destroyed before people notice them. At your disposal there is another invention - Super-Gun with which the scientist will shoot off his failed experiments!

Breaking Mad - A dynamic side-view shooter where you, as a mad scientist, shoot monsters that were generated by unsuccessful experiments. More than 30 difficult levels will make you strain and choose your routes wisely, firing from behind cover and monitoring the number of rounds, at the end you will find the most difficult test in the face of the Television Boss!



Game Features:
- 30 levels
- the boss
- difficulty
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Responsive management
